reviewText: Very informative especially with the live demonstration done in a very professional yet very sensual way. Both the doer and the doee explained very well what was happening in a way you can learn a great deal and be ready to put to use the things you learn. Very useful video.

I found this to be a fabulous demonstration of how to practice expanded orgasm with a partner. Dr. Taylor and Mr. Heynemann take you through a brief introduction to the theory of expanded orgasm, and then walk you through a real demonstration of how to put a woman at affect, have her relax and feel, and take her on a thrilling ride, filled with orgasmic peaks and high plateau's and some over-the-top delights. After all that, they show you specific skills to bring your partner down to earth after a sumptuous journey.

This was such a powerful video that I've reviewed it over and over: Six times so far. Each time I learn some new tricks and pick up new information that thrills my lover.

Adding these techniques to my love-making sessions has my partner turned on, feeling fulfilled, and saying yes to dates way more often. As an added bonus, she is usually enthusiastic to return the favor. Not that I expect that, but that's usually how it goes! Sometimes my partner even takes me on long expanded orgasmic journeys - applying these techniques to my body!

I discovered this DVD having excitedly read the book, Expanded Orgasm, and discovered the most wonderful way for a man and woman to communicate and explore and enjoy each other ..... I can wholeheartedly recommend this DVD, it is WONDERFUL, and it holds out the promise that relationships can be revitalized and re-energized in ways that you might never have expected or even hoped for ..... IF the rating system had TEN STARS, this would earn a TWELVE!!!  Order the DVD AND the book!
